languageKey.label: Mailjet
Create and edit a form to let users subscribe to a specific Mailjet list.
Title
Mailjet contact list - Select a contact list where all new subscribers will be added. You can create additional contact lists at Mailjet.
Contact properties - Select which contact properties to show on your Mailjet subscription form.
Label for Mailjet Contact property 1 - Please enter a label that matches of the first select contact property in previous field (Contact properties).
Label for Mailjet Contact property 2 - Please enter a label that matches of the second select contact property in previous field (Contact properties).
Label for Mailjet Contact property 3 - Please enter a label that matches of the third select contact property in previous field (Contact properties).
Description for Mailjet Contact property 1
Description for Mailjet Contact property 2
Description for Mailjet Contact property 3
Description for Form
Description for Form
Submit Button Label
Email Heading Text
Email body text
Email Confirmation Button Text- This is the text of the button inside the subscription confirmation email.
Email footer text
Thanks, ....
Owner - Site owner name, shown at the end of the subscription confirmation email.
Confirmation Message - Subscription confirmation email sent to %email. Please check your inbox and confirm the subscription. -> The '%' symbol will be replaced by the email of the current user.
Data type mismatch error - Please enter your error message. The '%id' symbol will be replaced by the name of property.
Subscribe error. Please try again later! - This message will appear in case an error occured during subscription form submission.
The contact % is already subscribed - This message will appear when the subscriber already exists in your Mailjet contact list. The % symbol will be replaced by the email address of the subscriber.
"Thanks for subscribing... " message - This message will appear when the subscriber is successfully added to the contact list.
Label for email field
Email FROM address - this is required field! This is email from address for confirmation email! If the field is empty when user sumbit a form will throw a error!
Email

Email
